posts.name: Peter Johnson
posts.cooked:
arnon001:

I‚Äôm searching for something that will look just like the competitions FMS

‚ÄúLook just like‚Äù in what way?  Visual displays?  Networking configuration?  Field sensors?  What problem are you trying to solve?  If you can describe your problem better we‚Äôll be more equipped to help you.  As discussed in this thread, there are basically only two options: FIRST‚Äôs off-season FMS (not yet released for 2022) and Cheesy Arena (which is).

What do you need the FMS for? Cheesy Arena is open source, so you should be able to modify it to make it look like the official FMS, although this is far beyond my level of skill (and probably isn‚Äôt worth the effort given the number of people who prefer cheesy arena‚Äôs UI to FIRST‚Äôs.)

arnon001:

I‚Äôm right now using the Cheesy arena and its not very good

I‚Äôve found Cheesy Arena handles most tasks as well or better than FMS . As others have said, it would be great to hear what you want to solve for/be more like official FMS . Of course, you can also suggest changes since it‚Äôs open source.

posts.name: Jared Hasen-Klein
posts.cooked:
arnon001:

Visual Displays

Audience display? Pit displays? On field displays (‚Äúteam number signs‚Äù)? Scorekeeper interface? FTA interface?

Which of these things do you want to change, and in what way?

arnon001:

It will be easier

I think we might be lacking some context as to what you‚Äôre trying to accomplish. If you can explain how/why having the official FMS will make your task easier, it‚Äôll likely help with us finding you a suitable solution.

posts.name: EricH
posts.cooked:
It seems like you want an FMS that looks exactly like the official in-season FMS. Is that correct?

If that‚Äôs your primary criteria, then you‚Äôll need to wait for Offseason FMS. It will be out when it comes out.

And it‚Äôs not as good as Chezy Arena.

Also: you can rent an official FMS from FIRST for offseason events. But you need an FTA for your event to do that as I recall.
I want it to look just like the official FMS in the scoring (which is less important) and the Wining animation so it will look just like the Official FMS

posts.name: EricH
posts.cooked:
Question: Why?

The animation, for what it‚Äôs worth, is pretty recent (think they really only started in 2017 maybe? 2018 for sure). In my opinion, it‚Äôs worthless‚Äìno value added. I‚Äôd rather just have the scores.
Agreed. With real-time scoring everyone who knows anything already knows who won by the time it plays.
